FlagAggregator.mainSelect: select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori, --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo --8 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b ,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where v.ctar1 = a.ctar1 and d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN(select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 30') and a.operando = b.operando and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR='PR3208025' and tipo ='FLAG' group by v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, a.operando, get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori, nvl(prezzo,0),b.id_operando,tipo

FlagExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_FLAG.legacy, --4 FACTS_F_FLAG.tipo, --5 FACTS_F_FLAG.operand, --6 FACTS_F_FLAG.saison, --7 FACTS_F_FLAG.prog, --8 FACTS_V_FLAG.legacy, --9 FACTS_V_FLAG.tipo, --10 FACTS_V_FLAG.ab, --11 FACTS_V_FLAG.bis, --12 FACTS_V_FLAG.boolkz, --13 FACTS_V_FLAG.tarifart, --14 FACTS_V_FLAG.kondigr, --15 FACTS_V_FLAG.prog --16 from facts_key,FACTS_F_FLAG,FACTS_V_FLAG where facts_key.legacy = FACTS_F_FLAG.legacy and FACTS_V_FLAG.legacy=facts_key.legacy and FACTS_F_FLAG.legacy=FACTS_V_FLAG.legacy and FACTS_F_FLAG.prog=FACTS_V_FLAG.prog order by FACTS_F_FLAG.prog
